alert.note: Alert for Henry (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 09 at 7:38PM CST by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT NORTHEASTERN HENRY AND NORTHWESTERN CLAY COUNTIES THROUGH 915 PM EST/815 PM CST/... At 837 PM EST/737 PM CST/, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Fort Gaines, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Fort Gaines, Days Crossroads, Shorterville, Walter F. George Lock And Dam, Walter F George Lake, Standleys Store, Otho, Watson Crossroads, Double Bridges, Moores Crossroads, Ricks Place, Pecan, Garnersville, Screamer, Coates, Bagby State Park, Thomas Mill Creek, Jones Crossing, Bethel, and Cotton Hill. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
